column5: Trying to find a sled video I saw a couple of days ago, the vid was about 3 min long, they were running water and broken ice.
I have one of me and my buddies doing that about 15 years ago.  However, it is on vhs.... Water skipping can be lots of fun, regardless of what the nay-sayers think.
here found a few the second one is from my hometown these guys are insane          i love it  ohh and one more who needs a seadoo when you have a skidoo  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jmdPJFNmEDE&NR
NOTE: this isnt for dialup will take longer to load
thats just crazy man..  ..i cant believe it...they really go for along ways on the water.and when stopping or slowing down is not an option
On a Bombardier with a 2 inch paddle track you can accellerate on water.
We used to go to Mactier every year for the puddle jump competition- it was a blast! Nothing could run on water like a ski-doo Mach Z!
i think i know the vid your talking about .... it was crazy... video taken by helicopter... for some reason i cant find it again .. it was posted on another site
